message.name: HEARTBEAT
message.description: The heartbeat message shows that a system is present and responding. The type of the MAV and Autopilot hardware allow the receiving system to treat further messages from this system appropriate (e.g. by laying out the user interface based on the autopilot).
message.field: Type of the MAV (quadrotor, helicopter, etc., up to 15 types, defined in MAV_TYPE ENUM)
Onboard time
8 data bytes to send whatever you want.
MAVLink version, not writable by user, gets added by protocol because of magic data type: uint8_t_mavlink_version

message.name: THREAD_INFO
message.description: Message to report the execution time of the threads up till moment t [us].
message.field: Onboard time.
Thread ID.
Get the priority of the thread.
get last duration [us].
get last latency [us].
total duration counter: used to compute the average duration [us].
total latency counter: used to compute the average latency [us].
number of executions of the thread.

message.name: PARTITION
message.description: Message to read the entire eeprom.
message.field: Partition ID - make this a general purpose message
First register that was read out.
Holds how many bytes are of importance, begining from index.
Holds how many partitions are still to come. If togo = 0, the last message was received.
Values of the 32 fields, starting from the indicated register

message.name: GPIO
message.field: Time at which the message was sent.
8 gpio floating point values
4 gpio integer values

message.name: EVENT
message.description: Message to send event information: can be external event from base or event on robot
message.field: Event identifier. 0-1000 are reserved for microOS. User-specific events should be higher than 1000.

message.name: PRINT
message.description: Message allowing short strings to be passed on.
message.field: Text to be sent. We suggest termination with '\0'.

message.name: PARAM_INT
message.description: Message to read/write parameters to microOS.
message.field: Partition ID - make this a general purpose message
First register that was read
Parameter name
Parameter value

message.name: PARAM_FLOAT
message.description: Message to read/write parameters to microOS.
message.field: Partition ID - make this a general purpose message
First register that was read
Parameter name
Parameter value

message.name: PARAM_STRING
message.description: Message to read/write parameters to microOS.
message.field: Partition ID - make this a general purpose message
First register that was read
Parameter name
Parameter value

message.name: PARAM_DATA
message.description: Message to read/write parameters to microOS.
message.field: Partition ID - make this a general purpose message
First register that was read
Parameter name
Parameter value
